page.title: 20Wetton and Grindon Credits
page.content: The following pupils of Warslow Middle School prepared the information for this Domesday Block containing the villages of Wetton and Grindon. Only 3 of the children live in or near Wetton, some live some distance away to the north around the village of Flash. Mark Critchlow - The Brund David Eardley - Flash George Edgecox - Quarnford Debra Grindey - Flash Tracey Grindey - Flash David Hodgkinson - Wetton Andrew Mellor - Quarnford Vicky Morel - Flash Martin Oulsnam - Wetton Julia Probert - Wetton Karen Shaw - Quarnford Julie Tunnicliffe - Gradbach Carol Wilkinson - Flash The staff who helped the pupils were Hazel Collett and Joe Gallagher.
